protocol.name: P-GSE61408-1
protocol.text: Data were normalized using the MAS 5.0 method with a scaling factor of 250. Analysis included only transcripts determined to be present (average expression of >=50 at any time point, as determined by empirical analysis). ID_REF =  VALUE = scaling factor=250; minimal present expression >=50

protocol.name: P-GSE61408-2
protocol.text: For auxin treatments, two days after germination, plants were transferred to 1uM 2,4-D medium and treated for 0 to 4 days. Root tips were harvested by cutting at 250 μM from the distal tip under the dissecting microscope using superfine scissors. Root tips were released in protoplast solution immediately after cutting and GFP positive cells were sorted.

protocol.name: P-GSE61408-3
protocol.text: For transdifferentiation time series’,plants were grown for twos day post germination seedlings before treatments began. All plants were grown on square plates. For meristem and QC profiles based on pWOX5:GFP in wild type and jkd backgrounds, we collected roots three days after germination and sorted GFP positive cells following protocols in Nawy et al. (2005).

protocol.name: P-GSE61408-4
protocol.text: Protoplasts were sorted directly into RNA extraction buffer, and RNA was extracted using the RNeasy Micro Kit with DNase treatment according to the instructions of the manufacturer (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-GSE61408-5
protocol.text: RNA quality and quantity was assessed using the Bioanalyzer (Agilent Technologies) and amplified and labeled using the WT-Ovation Pico RNA Amplification System and FL-Ovation cDNA Biotin Module V2, respectively (Nugen Technologies).

protocol.name: P-GSE61408-6
protocol.text: Labeled cDNA was hybridized, washed, and stained on an ATH-121501 Arabidopsis microarray using a Hybridization Control Kit, GeneChipHybridization, Wash, and Stain Kit, GeneChip Fluidics Station 450

protocol.name: P-GSE61408-7
protocol.text: Standard scanning conditions were used on the GeneChip Scanner (Affymetrix).
